name: Supernatural: The Hunt for Jimmy Novak
name_original: Supernatural: The Hunt for Jimmy Novak
description:
This game was made by me, my son, and his best friend using GB Studio 2.0 Beta. It was more or less to learn the ins and outs of gbstudio and to help show my son that we COULD make a game.

Goal of the game

Rescue Jimmy Novak, and find out what happened to Castiel.

Controls

Move Player -  WASD  or Arrow keys / Dpad

Start Game - Enter / Start

Save Game - Shift / Select

Interact - Z / A button

Attack - X / B button
